message: Let's split it 50/50 and get it over with!
You're being too generous, I'll take 60, you can have 40!
No way, I'm not getting taken advantage of! I'll offer you 30, I'll take 70.
You can't have it all, I'm making a strong move!
You're getting desperate, I'll take 70, you can have 30, but don't expect any mercy!
You think I'm desperate? I'll take 80, you can have 20, and don't think you're getting away with it that easily!
You're not getting any mercy, I'm taking control now!
You're trying to strangle me, I'll take 80, you can have 20, but this is my last offer!
You think this is your last offer? I'll take 95, you can have 5, and don't bother making another one!
I'm not leaving anything for you, take it or leave it!
You're being ruthless, I'll take 90, you can have 10, but don't think you're getting away with this!
You think 90 is a good deal? I'll take 92, you can have 8, and don't bother trying to negotiate further!
You're running out of time, take it or leave it!
You're getting desperate, I'll take 95, you can have 5, this is my last stand!
No way, I'll take 98, you can have 2, and don't bother trying to negotiate further!
This is it, I'm not leaving anything for you, take it or leave it!
I'll take everything, you're getting nothing, it's the final offer!
Too little, too late! I'd rather get nothing than let you take it all!
